Key Match Events: Bauers hit an RBI single in the ninth inning to score Jackson Chourio, winning the game 2-1.
Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers had clinched the NL Central earlier when the Cubs lost, but needed to win this game to prevent the Phillies from securing a playoff berth.
Post-Match Reflections: Bauers said, 'I think the vibe in the clubhouse all day was, that's great that we (clinched), but we need to win this game,' indicating the team's focus on the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Milwaukee clinched its second straight division title and made the playoffs for the sixth time in the last seven seasons.
Philadelphia's magic number to qualify for the playoffs is one, and four to clinch the NL East.
